metadata.name: Deployment Deleted From Kubernetes Cluster
metadata.comment: Detects the removal of a deployment from a Kubernetes cluster. This could indicate disruptive activity aiming to impact business operations.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM api_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 4 AND lower(api.operation) = lower('delete') AND exists(resources, x -> lower(x.name) = lower('deployments')))

output.summary: Detects the removal of a deployment from a Kubernetes cluster. This could indicate disruptive activity aiming to impact business operations.
